content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the defendant has been ordered to pay professional fees and stamp duty while the applicant is responsible for paying stamp duty as well the court decided to dissolve the marriage and divide the property awarding movable property to the defendant and immovable property to the applicant the court also determined that the banks obligations remain jointly and severally liable the applicant is responsible for paying the defendant compensation the legal text discusses personal property compensation for spouses and obligations related to matrimonial property the plaintiff requests the dissolution of the marriage establishment of childs residence child support division of property establishment of monetary obligations towards creditors and compensation for damages the defendant requests dissolution of the marriage and compensation for nonpecuniary damages the court will consider arguments and evidence from both parties to make a decision the court grants the dissolution of the marriage declares joint liability for certain obligations divides matrimonial property orders compensation to be paid dismisses certain claims and orders payment of costs and stamp duty

metadata.cost: 947.5 EUR (professional fees) +  1'278 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the defendant + 414 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant.
